transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji Rohit ji, Swapnil baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, recording line pe call kar rahe the sir abhi 96 wale number pe.
Customer: Haan, wo sir suniye na, mujhko na jo hotel mein jo silver container aate hai na silver container.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hotel mein jo parcel ke liye silver container use karte hai na.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai nahi, aap samajh rahe ho kya mai kya baat kar raha hu?
Executive: Aap product ka naam bata rahe hai jo ki mai abhi aapko whatsapp karunga aap usme likh denge to wo clear bhi ho jayega.
Customer: Haan, to wo jo silver container rakhte hai na uske upar ek lid aati hai, lid, paper ka lid aata hai, right?
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Haan, to wo paper ka lid manufacturer mujhko chahiye.
Executive: Accha, to sir whatsapp kar dete, mera number nahi hai aapke pass?
Customer: Nahi na sir, mai gaadi chala raha hu aur mujhko waha pe inquiry aaya to mai IndiaMART pe aise hi voice pe ispe call kiya 9696 pe.
Executive: Accha, nahi nahi 96 mein call karne ki jarurat nahi hai, mai aapko kyuki wo call hamare call center mein jaati hai waha se lead out hoti hai, call connect nahi hogi fir mujhe yaha se call karni padti hai, to isse better hai aap directly mujhe message kariye, mai aapko message kar raha hu. Aapka number kya hai? Aapka naam kya hai?
Customer: Swapnil baat kar raha hu, sir renewal abhi hua tha na mere through hi to karaya aapne.
Executive: Accha accha, are nahi wo dusra number save hai mere pass, wo kaunse aapke manager ka shayad.
Customer: IndiaMART ke bohot number hai.
Customer: Haan chalo koi baat nahi.
Executive: Message kar diya hai sir aap usme likh dijiye, jo bhi manufacturer ki details chahiye mai ek baar check karke aapko waha pe forward kar deta hu, thik hai?
Customer: Haan haan, to aap samajh gaye na mujhko kya chahiye, wo jo container ke upar jo lid aata hai na wo lid manufacturer mujhko chahiye.
Executive: Samajh gaya, bas please usko ek baar message pe agar mujhe likh denge to wo na word puri clear ho jayegi mujhe sir isliye mai aapko bol raha hu.
Customer: Chalo okay, mai gaadi chala raha tha, gaadi side mein leta hu, message karta hu fir chalata hu, thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai, aur future mein kabhi aisa kuch jarurat hai to directly aap mujhe message kariye abhi jaise last time bhi aapne invoice ke liye shayad bheja tha to maine aapko bataya tha wo sari cheeze, maine abhi aapko whatsapp kiya hai. Shayad aapke manager ka number save hai mere pass, aapka number save nahi hai shayad to chalo aapka number bhi save kar leta hu, Swapnil na?
Customer: Haan, Swapnil naam hai mera, maine whatsapp kiya hai abhi aapko.
Executive: Chalo okay thank you okay.
Executive: Thik hai sir, thank you, abhi is call ke baad na aapke pass ek feedback ka mail jayega to please usko satisfy kar dijiyega sir.
Customer: Haan ek baar wo aap mujhko detail to bhej dijiye na usme.
Executive: Wo to mai de dunga, ye actually concern jo open hota hai na ye service ko leke hota hai ki aapki service mein kuch problem aa rahi hai to isliye maine aapko ye cheez bola, thik hai?
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan, message to kuch aaya nahi sir.
Executive: Message kiya maine aapko sir.
Customer: Haan haan, abhi aap isme likh dijiye, likh dijiye jo bhi aapka wo bol rahe the na product ka naam wagera jiska aapko chahiye to wo mai ek baar apne end pe check karke jo bhi hota hai details wo mai aapko whatsapp kar deta hu.
Customer: Aluminium container lid okay manufacturer.
Executive: Thik hai, mai ek baar ye check kar leta hu IndiaMART mein jo bhi manufacturer hai unka mai aapko number ke sath screenshot deta hu.
Customer: Okay sir aisa chalu kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai sir, okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs aluminum container lid manufacturer details.

Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to send details on WhatsApp.
- Executive agreed to share manufacturer details.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will share details on WhatsApp.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- manufacturer, aluminum container, lid, whatsapp
